Articles.Content:
Hello!

So recently I bought KSP, and for some reason when I try to click update and enter my user, it says *Invalid user* or something like that. My question is, how do I repair this or can anyone send me a working launcher? Currently, I am on *Loud and clear*, But I am scared of the future.

Thinking ahead,

Lui

Hi @TheRealBloodEagle, the old patcher is finally dead, and the newest downloads of KSP (at least for Windows, Linux and macOS is coming) from the Squad store have patches to update to newer versions.

So your best bet is to go to your Squad store account downloads page and either grab a patch or the newest installer for KSP.

If you're using any other vendor please check their store page for updates, if you're using Amazon however please email Squad at [email protected] with your Amazon account purchase details.

Thanks a lot, @sal_vager! Really helps.

Thank you!
